resources.string: This is a work in progress. The goal is to have a functional notification system from Sales-channel, and in time add more properties and functionalities to this app, such as notifying the user if their locker is about to expire. DO NOT USE YOUR INGAME CREDENTIALS, as this app is not tied to those.

Insert your keywords below. You can use multiple words in one keyword, for example "Painful Maul of Apocalypse" would be considered one search parameter. Press "Add" after a keyword you insert, and when you have inserted all of them, send to server with "Send".
